name: @sagittal/system
description: Implementations of Sagittal notations, accidental parsing, useful metrics, comma naming, and finding and analyzing commas using Sagittal-specific properties.

scripts.profile: node --prof -r ts-node/register/transpile-only --max-old-space-size=131072 [[script.ts]] && node --prof-process isolate-*.log > processed.txt && rm isolate-*.log
scripts.deploy: rm -rf dist && npm version patch && npm run build && npm publish --access public && echo Package published. Please commit.
